sourceDesc.bibl: "Miserias de México. Novela." Internet Archive, 3677301, https://archive.org/details/3677301.
Miserias de México. Novela. México: Andrés Botas y Miguel Editores, 1916.
Miserias de México. Novela. México: Andrés Botas y Miguel Editores, 1916.

encodingDesc.p: The original image files have been processed with OCR. The software used was ABBYY Finereader 12 Professional, with Spanish as recognition language.
The spelling has been checked and corrected where appropriate.
Inserted texts (e.g. letters), quotes, verse lines, foreign words and the reproduction of oral speech (e.g. speech with accent) have been marked up.
Notes by the author or editor have been marked as such.
